refsect2.title: trigger-build [-h] [--ip IP] [--port PORT] [--projects PROJECTS [PROJECTS ...]] [--dcfiles DCFILES [DCFILES ...]]
refsect2.para: Triggers a build on a DapsEnv daemon.

listitem.para: The IP address of the Daemon API server. Default: 127.0.0.1
The port of the Daemon API server. Default: 5555
A list (separated by spaces) of projects what should be built on a DapsEnv daemon.
A list (separated by spaces) of DC-Files what should be built on a DapsEnv daemon.
